AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{postSearchRequest.name}, '%')
AND p.contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{postSearchRequest.contents}, '%')
AND p.categoryId = #{postSearchRequest.categoryId}

p.createTime DESC
p.createTime ASC
p.categoryId ASC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
